name: Rise of the Necroids 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

The collapsing empire of the Necroids needs you to reclaim its territory. As the coordinator of the robotic army, design your unit's AI to adapt the behavior patterns of your soldiers. Anticipate your needs as fast as possible to make your troops an autonomous crew.

Platform: PC / Engine: Unity 5
Number of players: 1

Producer : Clément MARCHE
Game Design : Benjamin BRICHE and Guillaume DEJONGHE
Game Art : Ludovic CHATIN, Francky MALLIET and Jean-Philippe PUTOD
Game Design & Programming : Baptiste DERSOIR
Game Programming : Roméo INCARDONA
Music & Sound Design : Denis RIVOIRE and Lesly VERDEROSA
